mapper.insert: insert into Walk(peid, w_date, w_flag, w_like, w_location) values(#{peid}, now(), 0, #{w_like}, #{w_location});
mapper.select: select l.lid, l.l_image, l.l_desc, l.l_date, pl.p_latitude, pl.p_longtitude, p.pe_name from LikePlace as l join Pet as p on l.peid = p.peid join Place as pl on l.pid = pl.pid where l.lid=#{lid} and l.l_flag=0 order by l.l_like desc;
